research_question: At R=1.0A (slightly stretched), correlation increases (alpha=-0.35 vs -0.22 at equilibrium). Does the VQE error grow as the state moves away from HF? Comparing hardware error at R=0.5, 0.735, 1.0 reveals whether noise or correlation dominates.
description: VQE H2 at R=1.0A on qubits [2,4]. Moderate correlation regime. Part of PES sweep.
